txt.en:
Wargs are pack hunters. You can target a foe and increase the damage dealt by all members of your war party, while reducing their incoming healing.<rgb=#FF7700>

In Flayer: Pack Flayer
Roots target in place, causing them to be unable to block, parry, or evade attacks.

In Shadow: Shadow Pack
Lowers the defence and incoming healing of all enemies around the Warg.</rgb>
